definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Well, it’s just that your mom was always bugging you about it.
sentences.chinese: 我想大概是你媽媽以前總在在你耳邊嘮叨的關係吧。
大概你要花十到十五英鎊。

sentences.english: Doris:I think because I turned on the air conditioner right after showering and before I blow-dried my hair.
sentences.chinese: 大概是我剛剛洗完澡沒吹頭髮又立刻開冷氣的關係吧。

sentences.english: The soil sample came from a trench approximately 2 inches deep.
sentences.chinese: 土壤標本來自於一個大概2寸深的溝渠。

sentences.english: This is probably the biggest repercussion of the calculation.
sentences.chinese: 這大概是計算的最大影響。

sentences.english: It comes to about eleven and a half million dollars.
sentences.chinese: 這樣大概是一千一百五十萬美元。

sentences.english: About one-third had previously been sexually active.
sentences.chinese: 其中大概有三分之一的人在此之前有過性活躍狀態。

sentences.english: If negativity does happen, it will probably come unexpectedly.
sentences.chinese: 如果否定性發生，它將意想不到地大概來。

sentences.english: It's very long. I think it's three hours long.
sentences.chinese: 這齣戲很長，大概有三小時。

sentences.english: You can probably see the obvious advantages to structuring your information this way.
sentences.chinese: 您大概可以看出用該方法構造信息結構的明顯優勢。

sentences.english: I'm afraid my sister married a real wimp.
sentences.chinese: 我看我的妹妹大概是嫁了一個真正的軟骨頭。

sentences.english: Ginger and turmeric are about as close as you can get to good-tasting medicine.
sentences.chinese: 姜和薑黃大概是味道最好的藥物。

sentences.english: Around 50 of his images were presented on a giant screen. And the critics lapped them up.
sentences.chinese: 大概有50張左右的圖片被展示在巨大的屏幕上。

sentences.english: Around 11:30 on the second day, the food trolley came around again.
sentences.chinese: 大概第二天的11點半鐘，食品小車兒又來啦。

sentences.english: These forecasts are only general trends.

definition: to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
almost/nearly/more or less/about the same/good enough/not bad
at the minimum/at the very least
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
(modal particle indicating suggestion or surmise)/...right?/...OK?/...I presume.
bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)/to puff (on a pipe etc)/(onom.) bang/abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]
